item.title: Vinci Compass 收购 Stuhlberger's Verde 的控股权
item.description: Vinci Compass Investments Ltd. 正在收购巴西资产管理公司 Verde Asset Management 的控股权，该公司是路易斯-斯图尔伯格（Luis Stuhlberger）近三十年前发起的 Verde 基金的母公司。【原文：Vinci Compass Investments Ltd. is acquiring a controlling stake in Verde Asset Management, the Brazilian asset manager home to the Verde fund launched by Luis Stuhlberger almost three decades ago, in a deal that underscores shifting dynamics across the local hedge fund industry.】

item.title: 斯塔默率商业代表团访问印度，宣传英国贸易协定
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）将率领一个由 100 多名英国商界、学术界和文化界领袖组成的代表团访问印度，在签署了期待已久的自由贸易协定之后，他将努力深化两国之间的贸易往来。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer will lead a delegation of more than 100 British business, academic and cultural leaders to India, as he seeks to deepen commerce between the two countries after signing a long-awaited free trade agreement.】

item.title: 马来西亚 2026 年预算计划交易指南
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）准备公布明年的国家支出计划，投资者希望看到在财政审慎和面对美国关税时支持贸易依赖型经济的需要之间取得平衡。【原文：As Malaysia’s Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim prepares to unveil the nation’s spending plan for next year, investors are keen to see a balance between fiscal prudence and the need to support the trade-reliant economy in the face of US tariffs.】

item.title: 美国关门刺激避险需求，黄金逼近4000美元
item.description: 美国政府停摆为美联储在本月晚些时候召开政策制定者会议之前的加息路径增添了另一层不确定性，黄金创下新纪录，逼近每盎司 4,000 美元。【原文：Gold clinched a fresh record — pushing closer to $4,000 an ounce — as the US government shutdown added another layer of uncertainty over the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path before a gathering of policymakers later this month.】

item.title: 力拓集团斥资 7.33 亿美元建设澳大利亚铁矿石枢纽中心
item.description: 力拓集团及其合作伙伴三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：Rio Tinto Group and partners Mitsui & Co. and Nippon Steel Corp. will spend $733 million on developing new iron ore mines in the Pilbara region of Western Australia to sustain output from the West Angelas hub.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随科技股推动的美国股市涨势：市场综述
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.美元上涨，日元则保持了近五个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Stocks in Asia look set for a positive open after Advanced Micro Devices Inc.’s blockbuster deal with OpenAI helped fuel a rally in chipmakers that sent US shares to all-time highs. The dollar rose, while the yen held its biggest drop in almost five months.】

item.title: 日本面临高风险债券销售，高市获胜引发市场震荡
item.description: 支持刺激政策的保守派人士佐那江隆一在执政党领导人竞选中出人意料地获胜，给日本债务市场带来了冲击波，交易员们正在为日本 30 年期政府债券的拍卖做准备。【原文：Traders are bracing for an auction of 30-year government bonds in Japan after pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi’s surprise victory in the ruling party leadership race sent shock waves through the nation’s debt markets.】

item.title: 新西兰企业前景黯淡加剧衰退风险
item.description: 新西兰企业在第三季度不太乐观，这增加了经济再次衰退和央行进一步降息的风险。【原文：New Zealand businesses were less optimistic in the third quarter, raising the risk of another recession and deeper interest-rate cuts from the central bank.】

item.title: Cboe 获准在澳大利亚上市，威胁竞争对手 ASX
item.description: Cboe Global Markets Inc 获得监管部门批准在澳大利亚股票市场上市，使其更接近于挑战澳大利亚陷入困境的主要交易所运营商 ASX Ltd。【原文：Cboe Global Markets Inc received regulatory approval to conduct sharemarket listings in Australia, bringing it closer to challenging the nation’s embattled main exchange operator ASX Ltd.】

item.title: B.莱利计划寻求纳斯达克听证会以推迟退市
item.description: B.在纳斯达克拒绝了该公司要求更多时间提交逾期季度报告的请求后，Riley Financial Inc.【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. said it will ask for a hearing to keep its Nasdaq listing after the exchange turned away the firm’s request for more time to file its overdue quarterly reports.】

item.title: 最高法院驳回谷歌暂停 Play 商店变更的请求
item.description: 在《堡垒之夜》（Fortnite）制作商史诗游戏公司（Epic Games Inc.【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google lost a US Supreme Court bid to pause major changes to its Google Play app store in an antitrust case filed by Fortnite-maker Epic Games Inc.】

item.title: 安必帕尔公司总裁的抵押品在巴西公用事业交易中被抢走
item.description: 上周末，陷入困境的巴西 Ambipar Participacoes e Empreendimentos 公司的负责人和一名共同投资者似乎失去了债务发行的抵押品，因为债权人代表采取行动没收了他们在一家水力发电公司的股份。【原文：The head of embattled Brazilian firm Ambipar Participacoes e Empreendimentos, along with a co-investor, appeared to lose their collateral in a debt issuance over the weekend when creditors’ representatives moved to seize their shares in a hydroelectric power company.】

item.title: 堪萨斯城联储主席称利率应向需求增长倾斜
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，官员们需要继续对通胀施加压力，因为通胀一直居高不下。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said officials need to keep pressing against inflation, which has remained stubbornly high.】

item.title: 岩点燃气将多伦多首次公开募股规模扩大至 7.04 亿美元
item.description: Rockpoint Gas Storage Inc. 大幅增加了本周首次公开募股计划的股票数量，使募集资金高达 7.04 亿加元（约合 5.05 亿美元）。【原文：Rockpoint Gas Storage Inc. substantially increased the number of shares it plans to sell in its initial public offering this week, lifting proceeds to as much as C$704 million ($505 million).】

item.title: 诺和诺德支持的 MapLight 在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中寻求 2.51 亿美元的配售资金
item.description: MapLight Therapeutics Inc.是一家开发神经系统疾病治疗方法的生物技术公司，尽管美国政府停摆使上市进程复杂化，但该公司仍在寻求通过首次公开募股和私募融资 2.508 亿美元。【原文：MapLight Therapeutics Inc., a biotechnology firm developing treatments for neurological disorders, is seeking to raise $250.8 million in an initial public offering and private placement, proceeding despite the US government shutdown complicating the listing process.】

item.title: 斯坦福大学将短期债务计划增至 10 亿美元
item.description: 斯坦福大学将商业票据计划增加了 5 亿美元，达到 10 亿美元，这是美国高等教育机构在应对联邦资金压力时采取的最新举措。【原文：Stanford University increased a commercial paper program by $500 million to $1 billion, marking the latest institution in US higher education to do so as colleges contend with federal funding pressures.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚第三季度炼油利润反弹 5 亿美元
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）称，炼油利润率在第三季度出现反弹，与前三个月相比增加了约 5 亿美元的收益。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said refining margins rebounded in the third quarter, adding about $500 million to earnings compared with the three months prior.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 计划在哥伦比亚港口再建一个液化天然气进口终端
item.description: 由于哥伦比亚面临液化天然气日益短缺的问题，Ecopetrol SA 公司正在敲定一项计划，将哥伦比亚港口的一部分配置成进口液化天然气的设施。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is finalizing a plan to configure part of a Colombian port into a facility to import liquefied natural gas as the nation faces a growing shortfall of the fuel.】

item.title: 阿根廷连续第五天抛售美元，财政部耗尽储备金
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，阿根廷政府周一连续第五个交易日在外汇市场抛售美元，试图阻止比索汇率下滑。【原文：Argentina’s government sold dollars in the foreign-exchange market Monday for a fifth straight session as it tries to stem a slide in the peso, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会调查 AppLovin 数据收集行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国证券交易委员会一直在调查移动广告技术公司 AppLovin 公司的数据收集行为。该公司股价下滑。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission has been probing the data-collection practices of the mobile advertising tech company AppLovin Corp., according to people familiar with the matter. The company’s shares slid.】

item.title: 华尔街以 3 倍 ETF 出价测试监管机构的风险偏好
item.description: 三家基金管理公司希望出售交易所交易基金，这些基金可以将特斯拉、比特币和其他资产的波动放大到罕见的程度，为再次考验监管机构对超风险产品的容忍度创造了条件。【原文：A trio of money managers want to sell exchange-traded funds that amp up swings in Tesla, Bitcoin and other assets to a rarely seen degree, setting the stage for another test of regulators’ tolerance for ultra-risky offerings.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 开始为小型银行处理交易
item.description: Citadel Securities 总裁吉姆-埃斯波西托（Jim Esposito）表示，Citadel Securities 已开始为中小银行处理交易，旨在为它们提供更好的固定收益证券定价。【原文：Citadel Securities has begun processing trades for small and mid-tier banks in a partnership aimed at providing them better pricing on fixed-income securities, according to President Jim Esposito.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 "金手指 "在股价飙升的同时不断扩散
item.description: 在与其他科技公司合作部署其人工智能产品方面，OpenAI 已经证明了自己的金手指。不过，它推动股价上涨的力量正在迅速扩散到它甚至短暂讨论过合作的公司。【原文：OpenAI has already proved it has a golden touch when it comes to partnering with other tech firms to deploy its artificial intelligence products. Its power to move shares, though, is rapidly spreading to companies it even briefly discusses teaming up with.】

item.title: 对美出口再度下降，特朗普关税加深巴西痛苦
item.description: 在两国总统进行 "积极的 "通话数小时后，周一公布的最新数据显示，巴西对美国的出口正受到这个世界最大经济体关税的冲击。【原文：Brazil’s exports to the U.S. are being crushed by tariffs from the world’s largest economy according to fresh data published on Monday, hours after a “positive” phone call between the presidents of both nations.】

item.title: Orsted 筹集 94 亿美元资金，应对美国风能政策转向带来的冲击
item.description: Orsted A/S 通过供股募集了 600 亿丹麦克朗（约合 94 亿美元），这对该公司应对风电行业面临的低迷形势至关重要。【原文：Orsted A/S raised 60 billion Danish kroner ($9.4 billion) through a rights offering that’s critical for the company to tackle the downturn facing the wind power industry.】

item.title: 高市获胜后交易员对日元的看涨情绪为 2022 年以来最低
item.description: 支持刺激政策的立法者佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）几乎肯定会成为下一任首相，这使得日元汇率暴跌，期权交易商三年多来最不看好日元。【原文：Options traders are least bullish on the Japanese yen in more than three years as pro-stimulus lawmaker Sanae Takaichi’s near-certain ascent to become the next prime minister sent the nation’s currency tumbling.】

item.title: 比特币期权交易商在创纪录的涨势后盯上了 14 万美元
item.description: 上周末，比特币突然创下历史新高，这让期权交易商增加了押注，认为这种最大的加密货币将反弹至 14 万美元。【原文：The sudden push to a fresh all-time high in Bitcoin over the weekend has options traders adding to bets that the largest cryptocurrency will rally to $140,000.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行推迟加元债券销售
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在法国总理周一意外辞职后，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）已推迟出售 10 年期加元债券。【原文：Credit Agricole SA has delayed selling a 10-year Canadian dollar bond after France’s prime minister resigned unexpectedly on Monday, according to people with knowledge of the transaction.】

item.title: OpenAI 让 ChatGPT 用户在应用程序中连接 Spotify 和 Zillow
item.description: OpenAI 正在让 ChatGPT 用户更容易地连接聊天机器人中的第三方应用程序来执行任务，这是该公司将其旗舰产品打造成数字服务关键入口的最新举措。通过周一在 OpenAI 年度开发者大会上发布的新选项，ChatGPT 用户可以要求为周末创建一个播放列表，该应用将连接 Spotify 提出建议。另外，用户还可以在 Zillow 上查找特定社区的三居室住宅。【原文：OpenAI is making it easier for ChatGPT users to connect with third-party apps within the chatbot to carry out tasks, the company’s latest bid to turn its flagship product into a key gateway for digital services. With the new option, unveiled Monday during OpenAI’s annual developers event, a ChatGPT user can ask to create a playlist for the weekend and the app will connect with Spotify to make suggestions. Alternatively, a user can look up a three-bedroom home in a specific neighborhood on Zillow】
